article.Heading: Union Budget 2016-17: Cupid gains 5%; bags Rs 2.95cr order from DKT India
article.Summary: The company has received confirmation from DKT India to deliver male condoms worth Rs 2.95 crore between March & May 2016.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Cupid surged 5 percent intraday Monday as it has got order worth Rs 2.95 crore from DKT India.

The company has received confirmation from DKT India to deliver male condoms worth Rs 2.95 crore between March & May 2016.

Cupid has been supplying male condoms to DKT since 2012.

Garg, MD of Cupid said, "We are pleased to have DKT as our long term partner to support their country wide condoms distribution network."

At 10:02 hrs Cupid was quoting at Rs 244.70, up Rs 1.70, or 0.70 percent on the BSE.

Posted by Rakesh Patil
